tweets.text: @Techranology No problem at all, I know the PS5 range continues to be super popular. My other half is hoping for one in September for their birthday. We shall see 😂 -Ashleigh

@Techranology Yeah, sorry about that 🤷‍♀️
We do indeed offer both, although at times the stock coming in can be limited to the bundle version. If you went for that one, you can pay it off at anytime so save you waiting either way :) -Ashleigh
@EEContact @EE Go away fake EE account.
@Techranology @EE Not at all to you pal :)  -Ashleigh

@KevinJolliffe It is a shame to see you've already moved your phone contract over to Vodafone Kevin, certainly don't ever like to see a long standing customer leave, at the same time I have to be realistic in the sense that until now, we've not know of such an issue you've faced -Ashleigh

iPhone 13 Pro with the best Pro camera system ever on iPhone. Now in Alpine Green on the UK’s best 5G network. Plus get Apple Music, Apple TV+ and Apple Arcade included in your plan for 24 months. And save £96 when you trade-in your iPhone. Annual price changes and terms apply

@KevinJolliffe Oh I 100% understand that Kevin, and in all honesty if something isn't working as it should just reach out right away. It is what we're here to help with and potentially avoid such things happening going forward -Ashleigh

@62Sauzee Smashing, thanks for clarifying :) If you have the My EE app, can you login, then select the Menu > Upgrade > Contact Us and select 'Messaging' this will connected to the upgrades team directly. -Ashleigh

@FNBRNico Afternoon Nico, I'm sorry to hear that you're having an issue with your broadband speed at the moment. I'd love to support you with this. If you give our dedicated Broadband technical team a call on 0800 079 8586 they will look into this for you and help to resolve it. -Neil

@Techranology Hey Ranvir, not update to give at the moment, have you got yourself signed up for stock alerts? If you head over to: https://t.co/jqMBpquC8Y select the PS5 version you're after, then register your interest :) -Ashleigh

@EE @RobBradbrook The fact that no one could have predicted a CPI of over 5% doesn’t mean you couldn’t work on customer retention. Common sense should kick in that some raises are just bonkers and clearly made ‘because you can’. My plan INCREASES by an amount that other providers charge per year.
@KevinJolliffe I can imagine it will have been Kevin, was this something our technical team had a change to take a look into during the contract term? -Ashleigh

@Michael57690152 @EE The same one as you s22 white 128gb! There's been no communication unless I've asked either! Got told 21 days but today is day 21 and no change! Beginning to wonder why I'm leaving my current provider for them!

@KevinJolliffe Ah that makes perfect sense Kevin, the watch is great to have just attached to Bluetooth also :) It would need to be a call to the cancellation team, as our live chat agents can't submit the cancellation request I'm afraid. -Ashleigh

@KevinJolliffe Afternoon Kevin, I do hope you're keeping well. Its disappointing to see you're leaving the EE network, has anything happened to make you want to move away? Also, with the cancellation side, are you taking your number with you? -Ashleigh

Outrageous behaviour by @EE Charging daughter for two phone lines, having sold her new iPhone 13 with fake promise of early cancellation of number she doesn’t need. V upset. Fleecing customers.

The team are heading home for a good rest. 

Don’t worry, they’ll be back at 7am and, if you need help before then, look no further than the EE Community https://t.co/xPpAYBsI4s

iPhone 13 Pro. Now in Alpine Green.

With the biggest Pro camera system upgrade ever and Super Retina XDR display with ProMotion for a faster, more responsive feel.

Preorder now on the UK's best network: https://t.co/iyIYjfmwJ7 https://t.co/OvFJd1KZS0
Rise and shine it’s tweeting time ☺ We’re here until 11pm to help.
We're finished for the night. You’ve all been lovely! We'll see you 7am tomorrow. Need to change your personal details? Try My EE, which is available 24/7 https://t.co/7R4BhxY4OB

BSL users can also contact us using a sign language interpreter through the Interpreters Live! service, available from 8am to midnight, 7 days a week. If an interpreter is not immediately available, you can hold or retry later.

Find out more here: https://t.co/Sf62O88Q25

And we’ve partnered with Samsung to help customers with hearing impairments get the most out of EE and the new Samsung S22 range, too.

When our in-store QR code is scanned, it links to videos about the new Samsung series with sign language interpreter Simon, and closed captions. https://t.co/xggCSlaJJV

It might be the end of #SignLanguageWeek, but we're partnering with @SamsungUK to bring British Sign Language into our stores to make customers with hearing loss feel at ease.

We're encouraging our retail teams to learn some BSL basics with a series of videos like this one. https://t.co/WJpM8atBNC

The new iPhone SE with 5G. Buy now on the UK's best 5G network, and enjoy Apple Music, Apple TV+, Apple Arcade and Apple News+ free for 6 months. Plus, save £96 when you trade in your iPhone.

Find out more and order at: https://t.co/hTMy5EO392 https://t.co/MOXggvlJbt
Good night, folks. Our team will be back at 8am tomorrow morning. You can access your account 24 hours a day at https://t.co/7R4BhxY4OB
It’s the weekend! We hope that you have a great one. If you need us, we’re here from 8am to 8pm.
We're finished for the day. Have a canny neet. We'll be back at 8am. Try My EE through the night, where you can manage all of your EE devices in one placehttps://ee.co.uk/ee-and-me

EE x @BEATPORT present PARALLEL 5G. Watch the live stream tonight from 7pm at Millennium Square, Leeds or here!
